    • Method Detail

      • frequencyOfTags

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> frequencyOfTags(boolean normalized)
        Counts the frequency of all POS-Tags in the text.
        Parameters:
        normalized - = true - will return the frequency of the characters proportional to 100%( 1.0 = 100%).
        = false - returns raw values;
        Returns:
        a sorted map with all POS-Tags(K) and their frequency(V).

      • nGramOfTags

        public java.util.Map<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>,java.lang.Double> nGramOfTags(int nGram,
                                                                                         boolean normalized)
        Parameters:
        normalized - = true - will return the frequency of the words proportional to 100%( 1.0 = 100%).
        = false - returns raw values;
        nGram - - length of the N Grams (must be >= 2)
        Returns:
        a sorted map with all n-grams of POS-Tags(K) and their quantity(V)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if nGram < 2

      • frequencyOfFuntionWords

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> frequencyOfFuntionWords(boolean normalized)
        Counts the frequency of all function words in the text.
        Parameters:
        normalized - = true - will return the frequency of the characters proportional to 100%( 1.0 = 100%).
        = false - returns raw values;
        Returns:
        a sorted map with all found function words(K) and their frequency(V).

      • avgFunctionWordsPerSentence

        public double avgFunctionWordsPerSentence()
        Calculates average function words per sentence Function words are e.g
        prepositions, pronouns, auxiliary verbs, conjunctions, grammatical articles or particles.
        Returns:
        total function words in text / total sentences

      • punctuationWordRatio

        public double punctuationWordRatio()
        Calculates the punctuation - word ratio
        Returns:
        total punctuations / text length in words
